original_text: The other people at the meal talked among themselves. They said, ‘Who is this man? Can he really forgive the bad things that people have done?’
korean_text: 함께 앉아 있는 자들이 속으로 말하되 이가 누구이기에 죄도 사하는가 하더라

sentences.original_text: The other people at the meal talked among themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 식사에 있던 다른 사람들은 서로 이야기했다.

sentences.original_text: Can he really forgive the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 정말로 나쁜 것들을 용서할 수 있는가?
